subject: Bicycle Motocross
Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: After claiming half the BMX medals in Beijing, American riders were shut out in London, but the program director was excited about the young team’s chances in 2016.
snippet: After claiming half the BMX medals in Beijing, American riders were shut out in London, but the program director was excited about the young team’s chances in 2016.
